signals.Ask: We need a shared inbox solution that is easier to use than Hubspot.
signals.Evidence: Hubspot doesn't give us quite the ease of use that we need for handling shared inboxes.

signals.Ask: We require robust analytics and reporting capabilities to track email performance and customer interactions.
signals.Evidence: The analytics aren't quite there with our current setup.

signals.Ask: We need integration with Aircall and Slack for notifications and call management.
signals.Evidence: We have teams who don't necessarily live in their inbox, who are more on Slack.

signals.Ask: All team members must be on the same platform for effective use of the shared inbox.
signals.Evidence: It's an all or nothing thing; everyone would have to use work out of here.

signals.Ask: We need the ability to create custom reports based on specific tags and user interactions.
signals.Evidence: We want to understand when those people are emailing in, who they're talking to, and how many different people they are having touch points with.
